summary: Provides integration tests for the Stable Diffusion Attend‑and‑Excite pipeline, handling test environment preparation and verifying correct operation in half‑precision (FP16) mode.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the Attend‑and‑Excite component of the Stable Diffusion model in production settings, ensuring that FP16 inference runs without errors and meets performance expectations.
